data.title: Help The Cachar District To Fight Against The Flood
data.description: Since, 20 June, 2022 all of Silchar — southern Assam’s biggest town and the gateway to the three Barak valley districts — has been submerged in water unlike “ever before in its history”. There is no electricity, People are facing huge problems with drinking water, and emergency medical services are hampered.

data.title: Help Jayalakshmi in participating in Asian Games
data.description: Jayalakshmi is presently pursuing sailing in Nacra 17 & has won the first position in 2 selection trials held in Mumbai.  Nacra 17 is mix gender foiling Catamaran.  Her sailing partner is Praveen Prabhakar from Chennai. Ms.Jayalakshmi Sundaravadivelu has pursued her BE in Electronics and Communication Engineering from CEG, Anna University, Chennai.
